Advisory.Description: Ratpack versions before 1.6.1 generate a session ID using a cryptographically weak PRNG in the JDK's ThreadLocalRandom. This means that if an attacker can determine a small window for the server start time and obtain a session ID value, they can theoretically determine the sequence of session IDs.
Advisory.Summary: Low severity vulnerability that affects io.ratpack:ratpack-groovy, io.ratpack:ratpack-java, and io.ratpack:ratpack-session
